nodes.text: A spitapillar was a creature native to Tatooine. Luke Skywalker encountered one inside a Jawa sandcrawler.

This strange creature is the mini-boss in the Super Nintendo game Super Star Wars. The player first encounters it on Level 4: Sandcrawler (Inside). In game, this creature can fire fireballs from its mouth and four limbs.
Super Star Wars Official Game Secrets calls it a "Spitapillar".
